channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 people have died in the wildfires spreading across Southern California
item.description: The number of dead tied to the wildfires increases as local officials warn the toll will increase. About 180,000 people have had to evacuate.

item.title: In Los Angeles, people snap up air filters and wear masks against smoke pollution
LA fires: How three days of devastation unfolded
item.description: Multiple fires are still burning in LA as authorities warn fierce winds threaten more destruction.

item.title: Jimmy Carter is no saint in my house
item.description: For President Biden's legacy, we should look to late President Jimmy Carter's history in Central America.

item.title: Hartfield-Jackson Airport in Atlanta declares full ground stop due to snowstorm
item.description: A major snowstorm is snarling travel across the southern United States and has thrown Atlanta's Hartfield-Jackson Airport into a full ground stop. CBS...

item.title: Wildfire victims report looting. And, Trump set for sentencing in hush money case

item.title: Listen Live: Supreme Court hears arguments over TikTok ban
item.description: The Supreme Court is hearing arguments over a law that could lead to TikTok shutting down in the U.S. in less than two weeks.

item.title: 3 ways to maximize your savings returns in 2025
item.description: With interest rates falling, being savvy about your savings is key. Here's how to boost your returns this year.

item.title: What ignited the deadly California wildfires?
Trump says meeting with Putin being arranged
item.description: The US president-elect has said previously that he wants to negotiate an end to the war in Ukraine.

item.title: Mel Gibson says his home burned down in LA fires
item.description: The Oscar-winning film star criticises California Governor Gavin Newsom over the wildfires raging in LA.

item.title: Inmates are fighting California wildfires in long-running and controversial practice

item.title: Bride's fury after Instagram stunt wedding turns out to be real
item.description: The woman got married to her partner as she believed it would boost his social media following.

item.title: US announces $25m reward for arrest of Venezuela's Maduro
item.description: The reward was announced on the day Maduro was sworn in for a third six-year term as president.

item.description: Officials say the two biggest wildfires ravaging the Los Angeles area this week have burned at least 10,000 homes, buildings and other structures.

item.title: Strong December job growth points to fewer Fed interest-rate cuts
item.description: Friday's jobs numbers mark the last employment report of the Biden administration.
